all.message: fix(tool/editor/guide): removed by NOI Linux now

* fix(tool/editor/guide): now not included in NOI Linux

* style: format markdown files with remark-lint

Co-authored-by: 24OI-bot <15963390+24OI-bot@users.noreply.github.com>

all.message: fix(tools/editor/GUIDE): a workaround for some error in checkinstall
all.body:
说实话这个 Workaround 我是不太想加的，但是我在测试的时候确实遇到了反复的
玄学错误，典型例子是这样的：
```log
mkdir: cannot create directory ‘/usr/share/doc/GUIDE’: No such file or directory
```
分开创建目录似乎可以解决这个问题，就好像 `-p` 参数被忽略了一样…………

all.message: fix(tool/editor/guide.md): using echo instead of Heredoc
all.body:
because Tab is rendered to four spaces,
it breaks syntax of Makefile.
I try to avoid it by using `echo "xxx\n\txxx"` instead of Heredoc.
but this problem should be fix in the future.

[1]: https://github.com/OI-wiki/OI-wiki/pull/2919#issuecomment-767849672

all.message: feat(tool/editor/guide.md): add way to install on openSUSE
feat(tool/editor/guide.md): add way to install on Debian/Ubuntu
